description: This file contains test scripts for database constraints on the users table, including validation of required fields, uniqueness, constraints on specific fields like Norwegian ID and status, default values, and data bounds for ratings and dates.

methods.name: cleanup_test_data
methods.description: Cleans up previous test data before and after tests.

methods.name: record_test_result
methods.description: Records the outcome of each individual test (pass/fail) with context.

methods.name: create_test_user
methods.description: Creates a test user with specific email and phone number, returning the user ID.

methods.name: test_assert
methods.description: Asserts that a specified condition holds true, used for verifying default values and constraints.
